TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed INVOKEKIND extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how to invoke a function by .

remarks.format:
## Remarks For additional information about `INVOKEKIND`, see the MSDN Library.
The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](../Topic/How%20to:%20Map%20HRESULTs%20and%20Exceptions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.INVOKEKIND INVOKE_FUNC = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The member is called using a normal function invocation syntax.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.INVOKEKIND INVOKE_PROPERTYGET = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The function is invoked using a normal property access syntax.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.INVOKEKIND INVOKE_PROPERTYPUT = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The function is invoked using a property value assignment syntax.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.INVOKEKIND INVOKE_PROPERTYPUTREF = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The function is invoked using a property reference assignment syntax.
